metrics.name: ApproximateAgeOfOldestMessage
metrics.documentation: The approximate age of the oldest non-deleted message in the queue.

metrics.name: ApproximateNumberOfMessagesDelayed
metrics.documentation: The number of messages in the queue that are delayed and not available for reading immediately.

metrics.name: ApproximateNumberOfMessagesNotVisible
metrics.documentation: The number of messages that are in flight.

metrics.name: ApproximateNumberOfMessagesVisible
metrics.documentation: The number of messages available for retrieval from the queue.

metrics.name: NumberOfEmptyReceives
metrics.documentation: The number of ReceiveMessage API calls that did not return a message.

metrics.name: NumberOfMessagesDeleted
metrics.documentation: The number of messages deleted from the queue.

metrics.name: NumberOfMessagesReceived
metrics.documentation: The number of messages returned by calls to the ReceiveMessage action.

metrics.name: NumberOfMessagesSent
metrics.documentation: The number of messages added to a queue.

metrics.name: SentMessageSize
metrics.documentation: The size of messages added to a queue.
